description: This work should be represented as: Pink Mountain Intersection Improvement from approximately Km 225 to Km 227 of the Alaska Highway (Highway 97) in Northern British Columbia.
tags: Highway and road sign or guardrail construction and repair service
full_summary:
******************************************************
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Title:

EZ899-240253: Pink Mountain Intersection Improvement between Km 225 and Km 227

#### Tender Reference Number:

WS4057202132-Doc4057306153

#### Tender Type:

Invitation to Qualify for Competitive Selective Tendering

#### Tender Close Date:

June 30, 2023, at 14:00:00

#### Location:

Northern British Columbia, Canada

#### Contract Scope: 

The contract encompasses the improvement of the Pink Mountain intersection between Km 225 and Km 227 of the Alaska Highway (Highway 97). The scope of work includes:

* Widening the embankment and pavement for auxiliary lanes and left turn bays
* Improving a section of Cypress Creek Road adjacent to the highway
* Closure of access roads and removal of embankments crossing existing ditches
* Replacement of culverts under accesses
* Supply and installation of earthworks, granular materials, and asphalt
* Topsoiling and seeding embankments
* Removal and reinstallation of roadway signs
* Removal and disposal of roadside concrete barriers and supply and installation of the same
* Installation of pavement markings and rumble strips

#### Selection Criteria:

The lowest price will be the determining factor for contract award.

#### Contract Duration:

The expected contract start date is unknown, but the expected end date is August 30, 2024.

#### Contact Information:

Simon Leung (SPAC/PSPC)

Email: [simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL:

-http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16599917?extsite=MTY1OTk5MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
